properties.areaDesc: Eastern Pendleton; Western Highland; Western Pendleton; Eastern Highland
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 9:27PM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, sleet and freezing rain expected. Total snow and
sleet accumulations of less than one inch with ice
accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. Winds
gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...In Virginia, Highland County. In West Virginia,
Pendleton County.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. Precipitation may
briefly begin as snow before quickly changing to sleet and
freezing rain. Precipitation will change to rain late in the
day.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on
steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery,
increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY
